title: Envelope
description: An envelope containing a message, the message type, and the timestamp when it was sent.

sent_at.title: Sent at
sent_at.description: Date and time when the message was sent from the application processing the sensor data, expressed according to the ISO 8601 standard.

message_type.title: Message type
message_type.description: A reference to a json-schema defining the message type carried by this envelope.

message.title: Message
message.description: The message contained by this envelope.
